data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="fill_parent"
    background="#ffffffff"
    orientation="vertical" >

    <AtlasViewPager
        id="@+id/bus_atlas_gallery"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="width*0.73"
        fadingEdge="none"
        function="atlas_view_pager" />

    <TextView
        id="@+id/bus_atlas_title"
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_below="@+id/bus_atlas_gallery"
        layout_marginTop="10dp"
        function="title"
        paddingLeft="15dp"
        textColor="#ff000000"
        textSize="14dp" />

    <TextView
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_below="@+id/bus_atlas_title"
        function="desc"
        paddingLeft="14dp"
        paddingRight="15dp"
        paddingTop="10dp"
        textColor="#ff000000"
        textSize="14dp" />

    <LinearLayout
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="wrap_content"
        layout_alignParentBottom="true"
        function="head_dot"
        gravity="top|right"
        orientation="horizontal"
        paddingBottom="20dp"
        paddingRight="20dp" />

</RelativeLayout>

list.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    layout_width="fill_parent"
    layout_height="fill_parent"
    orientation="vertical" >

    <ImageView
        layout_width="fill_parent"
        layout_height="fill_parent"
        layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
        contentDescription="@null"
        function="image"
        scaleType="centerCrop"
        src="head_placeholder" />

</LinearLayout>
